subject: John Lennon messages?
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, I've asked John Lennon to give us some messages, if he can and wants to - last night! I beieve he DOES want to communicate. Let's try to experiment with him comming thru. I just ask if he's there and wants to talk or give a message, then wait for it. Seems he answers back.  Am I "Nuts"??? =Judy=    %-D
